#summary List of supported devices/operating systems

= Introduction =
This page list devices and operating systems weupnp has been tested with. Since this list is hard to populate, any help is welcome: let us know if weupnp works with your device/OS combination.

= Operating Systems =
weupnp works with
  * Linux (all flavors)
  * Mac OS X
  * Windows XP (since r3)

Presently, there appear to be some issues with Vista
